Name: SYS_UPTIME
Label: Uptime
Description: Elapsed seconds from device startup

Name: SYS_REGMAP_VERSION
Label: Register map version
Description:
Version of register map in format xxxyyy.
Xxx - major version of register map.
Yyy - minor version of register map.
Major version defines compatibility of different register maps. If major version of register map changes, the values previously stored in the flash memory are discarded and factory values are used

Name: SYS_STATUS
Label: Status register
Description:
Binary map of different status flags
Meaning of respective bits: 
Bit 0 - Generic error - Error in the device.
Bit 1 - Testing mode - Testing mode is enabled.
Bit 2 - Calibrated successfully - Calibration data read successfully.
Bit 3 - Modbus timeout - No modbus communication for timeout period.
Bit 16 - Configuration flash error - Error when working with configuration memory.
Bit 17 - Reset by IWDG - Last reset was caused by Independent watchdog.

Name: SYS_COMMAND
Label: Command
Description:
Following commands are supported:
Value 9901 - Reset
Value 8801 - Factory reset
Value 7701 - Testing mode
Value 66xx - Invoke error
Value 5501 - Invoke watchdog reset

Name: SYS_TEST
Label: Testing register
Description: Generic system testing register

Name: SYS_IO_INPUT
Label: Input signals
Description:
Set of input signals. 
Bits 0-4 - Modbus address offset
Bits 5-8 - Bootstrap
Bit 9 - Pushbutton

Name: FACT_SERIAL_NUMBER
Label: Serial number
Description:
Serial number of product with common device ID in format xxyyzzzz.
Xx - year of production
Yy - month of production
zzzz - serial incremental number of the product

Name: FACT_DEVICE_ID
Label: Product number
Description: Unique device ID

Name: FACT_HW_REVISION
Label: Hardware version
Description:
Hardware revision of the device defined as xxxyyy:
xxx - major revision (letter)
yyy - minor revision (number)

Name: FACT_BOOT_REVISION
Label: Bootloader version
Description:
Firmware revision of the bootloader as number xxxyyy:
xxx - major version of bootloader
yyy - minor version of bootloader

Name: FIRM_REVISION
Label: Firmware revision
Description: Firmware revision of the current application image as an incremental number. See list of FW revision or release notes for respective features.

Name: FIRM_ASSEMBLY_INFO
Label: Assembly date
Description:
Assembly information of the current application in format xxxxyyzz:
xxxx - year of FW build
yy - month of FW build
zz - day of FW build

Name: FIRM_APP_CHECKSUM
Label: CRC checksum
Description: CRC checksum of the current application

Name: FIRM_APP_SIZE
Label: Firmware size
Description: Firmware size of the current application in bytes

Name: COM_MB_BAUD_RATE
Label: Modbus baud rate
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port baud rate
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - 9600 - 9600 baud/s.
Value 1 - 19200 - 19200 baud/s.
Value 2 - 38400 - 38400 baud/s.
Value 3 - 57600 - 57600 baud/s.
Value 4 - 115200 - 115200 baud/s.

Name: COM_MB_PARITY
Label: Modbus parity
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port parity
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - NONE - NONE parity.
Value 1 - EVEN - EVEN parity.
Value 2 - ODD - ODD parity.

Name: COM_MB_STOP_BITS
Label: Modbus stop bits
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port - number of stop bits
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - 1 stop bit - 1 stop bit.
Value 1 - 2 stop bits - 2 stop bits.

Name: COM_MB_APPLY
Label: Apply modbus parameters
Description:
Apply new modbus communication parameters.
Value 1 - Apply new settings

Name: COM_MB_TIMEOUT
Label: Modbus timeout
Description:
Longer silent period implies connection lost.
Zero value disables timeout indication.

Name: CALIB_MODE
Label: Calibration mode
Description:
Set calibration resistance values to all channels.
Value 0 - calibration disabled
Value 1 - 8 - 100k low values 0 - 7
Value 9 - 16 - 100k FS values 31, 63, … 255
Value 17 - 24 - 2 x 1k FS values 31, 63, … 255

Name: CALIB_RESERVED
Label: Reserved
Description: Reserved for future use

Name: AMP_GAIN
Label: Amplifier gain
Description:
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - Gain 1 x - .
Value 1 - Gain 3 x - .
Value 2 - Gain 10 x - .
Value 3 - Gain 20 x - .

Name: AMP_LOAD
Label: Input Load
Description:
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - Load 100 Ohm - .
Value 1 - Load 1 kOhm - .
Value 2 - Load 2 kOhm - .
Value 3 - Load 10 kOhm - .

Name: DBG_WRITES_CONF
Label: Configuration writes
Description: Number of writes into internal configuration flash memory (size 4kB, entry 128 B, total endurance 10000 * 4096 / 128 = 320000)
